string-array.name: data_description
string-array.item: Bali is a popular tourist destination in Indonesia known for its beaches and culture.
Yogyakarta is a city on the island of Java known for its cultural heritage and temples.
Komodo Island is home to the famous Komodo dragons, the world\'s largest lizards.
Mount Bromo is an active volcano located in East Java, known for its stunning sunrise views.
Raja Ampat is a group of islands in West Papua known for their rich marine biodiversity
Ubud is a town in Bali known for its arts and culture.
Lake Toba is a volcanic lake in North Sumatra known for its scenic beauty and cultural significance.
Lombok is an island in West Nusa Tenggara known for its beaches and natural beauty.
Borobudur Temple is a UNESCO World Heritage Site located in Central Java, known for its ancient Buddhist architecture.
The Gili Islands are a group of three islands near Lombok known for their crystal clear waters and sandy beaches.
